TopicTitle: My rocket just stops responding completly.

Articles.Content:
Due to thinking that my glitch was fixed, I learned later it wasn't. That's why im uploading a second forum about this.

Sadly, this glitch isn't fixed.

Here's how this glitch works

When trying to make a polar orbit, If i go into map view, then fast foward, and go back, Nothing works. You can't fire up you're engines. Can't do next stage, can't turn off sas or rcs. or on. Same thing happens even if you don't go into map view.

This ONLY happens when i'm doing a polar orbit.

ELECTRIC CHARGE IS NOT THE PROBLEM.

WHY.

Edited October 11, 2015 by Dcseal
Are you sure you're not running out of electric charge ?

some more information is needed:

What version of KSP?

Are you running any mods? If so, which ones, and how were they installed?

Craft file would be useful, as would a save game

- - - Updated - - -

Are you sure you're not running out of electric charge ?

This actually makes the most sense, since you did mention about "turning off sas", which implies that it's on, which implies that electric charge is being used.

Are you sure you're not running out of electric charge ?

Oh my god. For the last time, It's obvious that's not the problem. I mentioned: My sas won't turn off or on. Can't fire off next stage, even if it's not a rocket.

I'm sorry, i've gotten this so many times. it's not that.

if you runout of electric charge, nothing will work.

Again, please supply some more info, as requested

Oh my god. For the last time, It's obvious that's not the problem. I mentioned: My sas won't turn off or on. Can't fire off next stage, even if it's not a rocket.

I'm sorry, i've gotten this so many times. it's not that.

Sorry for asking, but considering the incredible amount of information you gave in your OP, I couldn't know that wasn't the issue.

Good luck with your bug anyway.

OK. It. Is. Not. Electric charge. I can't go into the map view. I can't do ANYTHING but press esc and quit.

I'm in version 1.0, I got no mods. This happens to every craft.

Please read this.

- - - Updated - - -

It may be similar to this bug. But it doesn't seem solved yet though.

Dcseal, getting upset over an issue is no way to have that issue addressed, what we need from you is your logs, your save folder, and the steps you made to produce this issue.

If it's a bug, all this information needs to go on the Squad bug tracker.

People are much less inclined to help someone who is being angry.
